Here is the OuterHtml for the page:

{"<fieldset>
<legend>Health information:</legend>
<form action="">
Height <input type="text" size="3">
Weight <input type="text" size="3">
</form>
</fieldset>"}

Here is the InnerText for the same tag:

HealthInformation: Height Weight </form>

Is this a bug? Is there a way to fix the source to make this start working? Thanks for your help!
